title: Bug 17758[Navigator] Navigator View. Problems with 'Go Into' action
description: Bug 17758[Navigator] Navigator View. Problems with 'Go Into' action
OB: When closing a project in the Navigator view, the 'Go Into' action remains enabled for the closed project's folders.
EB: After closing a project in the Navigator view, the 'Go Into' action should be disabled for the closed project's folders. Additionally, a message indicating that the project is closed should be displayed in the Navigator view.
SR:
1. Disable the 'Go Into' action for folders of closed projects in the Navigator view.
2. Display a message in the Navigator view indicating that a project is closed when 'Go Into' action is not applicable.
